CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND( RecordType.Name = 'DN-ACCT-RECORD-TYPE',
OR( ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'CA DOD'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Clinical'), ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Consumer'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Dept of Defense'), ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Dept of Justice'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Hospital'), ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Institution'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Medical Doctor'), ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Pharmacy'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'University'), ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'VA Account'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Military CA'), ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Periodontist'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Oral Surgeon')) ), IMAGE('/resource/1580983395000/DN_Specialist_Img','Specialist',80,80),
IF ( AND( RecordType.Name = 'DN-ACCT-RECORD-TYPE',ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Lab')), IMAGE('/resource/1580983395000/DN_Lab_Img','Lab',80,80),
IF ( AND( RecordType.Name = 'DN-ACCT-RECORD-TYPE',
OR( ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Denturist'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Endodontist'), ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'General Dentist'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Military'), ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Multispecialty'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Orthodontist'), ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Other'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Pedodontist'), ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Prosthodontist'),ISPICKVAL(Speciality_Type__c , 'Restorative Dentist')) ), IMAGE('/resource/1580983395000/DN_GP_Img','GP',80,80),'' ) ) )
CustomField.label: Account Type Icon
